fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- May break up to two rules from 1-5 in <#1041811818600996864> each day (without getting punished).
- You still must put a spoiler and warning on NSFW/gore in accordance to rule 3.
- After breaking all 5 rules, two things happen: 1: you get banned, and 2: the GIM space-time continuum shatters, and roles are shuffled between the other players. Their goal and alignment will stay the same, unless the goal only works with certain abilities (ex. people playing as post 266 will not keep their goal on shuffle, however post 12 would)
